properties.Name: ExperianConsumerNotice
properties.Description:
Notices are statements based on your personal information and credit history. Suspicious items may be listed here.

Ex:
Date of birth indicates that credit may have been established before age 18.

Columns.Name: ExperianReportNumber
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Experian consumer.

Columns.Name: NoticeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a notice.
